hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select count(1) as ORDER_NUM from EO_ORDER EO where 1=1 and EOOR_STATUS_CODE IN ('00','10','20') <<and create_time > :createTimeFrom>> <<and create_time < :createTimeTo>> and <@dataFilter Table="HLS_ES_COMPANY_CODE" field= "COMPANY_CODE" alias="EO" /> and EOOR_ORDER_BIG_TYPE =:orderType
